subject: Re: [junit] junit, reporting and httpunit
msgSnippet: ... OR list ... I may add another - before the end of the month but I ll let you know. -Vladimir -- Vladimir Bossicard www.bossicard.com
messageBody:
> is that an ANDed list or an ORed list ?


OR list

> you can:
> - write your own TestResultListener
> - write your own TestRunner (and modify the addError... methods)
> - use the JUnitReport Ant task


I may add another '-' before the end of the month but I'll let you know.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
